column1: SATISFACTION WITH YOUR MAJOR AND UMASS-AMHERST
Within your major, how satisfied are you with:
Faculty concern for your academic progress.
Connections to the rest of your academics.
How satisfied are you with your UMass Amherst
While at UMass, did you participate in any of the following:
Practicum, internship, field or coop experience, clinical assignment.
Research project with faculty outside of course requirements.
What is most likely to be your principal
If you have accepted a full-time job,
what is your approximate annual salary?
If you have accepted a full-time job,
If you are attending graduate school this
year, what degree will you be seeking?
Survey methods and results at: www.umass.edu/oapa/oapa/reports/senior_survey. Office of Academic Planning and Assessment, 11/09/2015
